title: Multi-period Optimization of Hydrogen Refueling Station Layouts Considering Refueling Satisfaction and Hydrogen Fuel Cell Vehicle Market Diffusion
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01627G, Paper
Yan Zhou, Xunpeng Qin, Wenlong Yang
Hydrogen Fuel Cell Vehicles (HFCVs) are recognized as ideal green transportation alternatives. The large-scale development of Hydrogen Refueling Stations (HRSs) infrastructure is crucial for the extensive integration of HFCVs in...
